page.title: 15EDUCATION IN THE LUSTON AREA
page.content: The name of the school is{LUSTON C.P. {SCHOOL}and it is 16 years old.It has a {catchment area}which includes Bircher,Yarpole,Luston,Lucton and Eyton but children also travel to school from Leominster.In the school there are five classes.The number of children is about 130 and 9 staff.The staff include 5 teachers,3 dinner ladies and a secretary.We start school at 8.45,lunch is at 12.00 and school finishes at 3.05p.m.Our{subjects}are Maths,English,Art,Topic work and P.E and on Mondays we go swimming at the Sydonia Swimming Pool in Leominster. The school has an active{P.T.A.}who organise fund raising events. After school we have clubs such as rounders, computers, netball, football, etc. At school we can buy milk and we bring our own lunches.The school plays an important part in the life of Luston.
